= How to sign a SIS =

Before you can install Symbian applications that make use of certain features, such as KitchenSync, you must sign it. Sadly, this is quite an ordeal. It seems a signing option called Open Signing will appear any day now, which will make things simpler.

Until then, a self signing guide can be found here:
http://www.gsmblog.net/article.do?keyword=symbian-self-signing
